wikipedia_page.main: Lawrence "Larry" Canning (1 November 1925 – 6 April 2012) was a Scottish footballer who played for Aston Villa during the 1940s and 1950s, then later served on the board.

response: *6 April 2012: Larry Canning, 86, former Aston Villa wing half.
* 6 April – Larry Canning, footballer (Aston Villa) and broadcaster, vascular dementia (born 1925)
*Larry Canning, 86, English footballer (Aston Villa) and broadcaster, vascular dementia.
